metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7997 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The WPG format reader in GraphicsMagick 1.3.25 and earlier allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and crash) viavectors related to a ReferenceBlob and a NULL pointer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7997` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
libgraphicsmagick++3 - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
libgraphicsmagick3 - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1').
